data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Dan is 16 years old, so he is still in high school. In ____ mornings, he ____ classes ____ chemistry ____ math. Then, he ____ lunch ____ his ____ and ____ for a while. After ____, ____ has ____ class ____ history ____. After school he plays in a band.
data.partBlankContent: Dan is 16 years old, so he is still in high school. In t__ mornings, he ta___ classes i_ chemistry a__ math. Then, he h__ lunch wi__ his fri____ and rel____ for a while. After lu___, h_ has Eng____ class a__ history cl___. After school he plays in a band.
data.fullContent: Dan is 16 years old, so he is still in high school. In the mornings, he takes classes in chemistry and math. Then, he has lunch with his friends and relaxes for a while. After lunch, he has English class and history class. After school he plays in a band.
data.answer: 丹16岁了，所以他还在上高中。早上，他上化学和数学课。然后，他和他的朋友吃午饭，放松一会儿。午饭后，他有英语课和历史课。放学后，他在乐队演奏。
